summary: This document consists of sign-in sheets for mandatory quarterly Special Housing Unit (SHU) training at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York for Q3 2019, along with a post order for the Operations Lieutenant detailing shift duties. The sheets are dated around the time of Jeffrey Epstein's incarceration and death, indicating standard prison administrative procedures.

events.title: Start of Q3 SHU Training Period
events.description: Beginning date for the third quarter mandatory Special Housing Unit training sign-in period at MCC New York.

events.title: End of Q3 SHU Training Period
events.description: End date for the third quarter mandatory Special Housing Unit training sign-in period at MCC New York.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, New York
keyFacts: Document shows administrative sign-in sheets for mandatory quarterly SHU training at MCC New York for Q3 2019 (6/9/2019 - 9/7/2019).
Includes specific post orders for the Operations Lieutenant shift (12:00 A.M. - 8:00 A.M.) detailing count times, rounds, and equipment.
Training period covers dates immediately preceding and including Jeffrey Epstein's death in August 2019.
Document references standard prison procedures including official counts, sanitation checks, and inmate transport coordination.
All staff names on sign-in sheets appear to be redacted or illegible in the provided text.
